value.title: Meta Unmasks Hundreds Of AI Spies On Facebook And Instagram Made By Italian Surveillance Dealers
value.excerpt: Nearly 1,000 AI-generated fake profiles have been posing as protesters, journalists and young women, Meta warns, and they appeared to be targeted at reporters and political activists.

value.title: ‘AI Girlfriends’ Are a Privacy Nightmare
value.excerpt: Romantic chatbots collect huge amounts of data, provide vague information about how they use it, use weak password protections, and aren’t transparent, new research from Mozilla says.

value.title: Apple researchers unveil ‘Keyframer’: An AI tool that animates still images using LLMs
value.excerpt: Researchers at Apple have developed an AI-powered animation tool called Keyframer that allows anyone to animate static images using natural language prompts, opening up animation design to broader audiences.

value.title: Facebook rules allowing fake Biden “pedophile” video deemed “incoherent”
value.excerpt: A fake video manipulated to falsely depict President Joe Biden inappropriately touching his granddaughter has revealed flaws in Facebook's "deepfake" policies, Meta's Oversight Board concluded Monday.

value.title: A baby llama has possibly been stolen from Maine farm
value.excerpt: Mainers should be on the lookout for a baby llama that was possibly stolen from a farm in Acton. Acton Animal Control Officer Jim Driscoll was notified Sunday about a possibly stolen llama. He is asking farmers and neighbors in the area of Foxes Ridge and County roads to look out for the animal.
